content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Ms. Abbasi. I'm sure you'll find it quite suitable for your needs. How much are you looking to spend on rent per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm a student, so I'm on a budget. I'm looking for a place that's affordable and fits my needs. I'm smart and responsible, so I want to make a wise decision. What's the lowest price you can offer for this apartment?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that you're a student and have budget constraints. As a landlord, I aim to provide quality housing at a fair price. The lowest price I can offer for this apartment is €550 per month. This includes all utilities except for electricity, which you would be responsible for. Is this within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your offer. However, I must be honest with you. I'm looking to pay less than €550 per month. Could we negotiate a lower price?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly, Ms. Abbasi. I'm willing to negotiate. How much were you considering paying?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I was hoping to find something closer to €450 per month. I believe this would be a fair price considering the size and location of the apartment. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: €450 per month is significantly lower than my initial offer. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must maintain a certain profit margin to cover my expenses. Let's try to find a middle ground. How about €500 per month? This is still lower than my initial offer and reflects a good value for the apartment's location and amenities. Would you be willing to meet at this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position. €500 per month is more in line with what I had in mind. This is a fair price for both parties. I agree to the price of €500 Euro!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad to hear that, Ms. Abbasi. I agree to the price of €500 Euro as well. This is a fair price for both parties. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
